title: dEham tanil AtmA
sahitya:
dEham tanil AtmA pOlE jIvanilE paramAtmA


anupallavi

  Eka rasamAi yOga rasamAi bhOga rasamAip-pongum


caraNam    tangam tannait-taTTiyuruc-ceidaTTAn pOl vinaiyAlE nal 
guruvAkki jnAnam poliya nalgum paramanai nambu nallaruLE 
namdembu nallavar uravum nannUl arivum nar-cintanaiyum 
sheyalum vallavar vAzhvE mangalamAgum mahAdEvan aruLAlE
